title: Invisible Threat Gaming is looking for a Coach

embed.description: Coach that willing to help his team reach the goal of the OPL. This position will have the candidate managing the pick and bans for the games at tournaments also spectate practice matches and working closely with the players. This position is a voluntary position, but you can evolve into our brand to a paid job in the near future.

body: Applicants should apply for the position via this website!

replies.body: hey added u on league the application thing didnt work for me
